commit.message:
configure.in: Propagate ORIGINAL_LD_FOR_MULTILIBS to config.status.

* configure.in: Propagate ORIGINAL_LD_FOR_MULTILIBS to
config.status.
* configure: Rebuilt.

From-SVN: r63159

files.patch:

+	* configure: Rebuilt.

+   else
